location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter confirms the shipping of seventeen pairs of Kerman shawl goats and eight kids on the Eliza, with a detailed discussion of arrangements for their keeper and the suggestion for the goats to be forwarded to Europe before the rainy season begins. Also included as a detailed invoice for the goats, their freight and upkeep.
